section.title: Information on the support for JavaFX AUTs
section.para: AUT modifications No modifications are necessary to ensure that the AUT can be tested. The AUT can be deployed normally: no extra steps are needed for a test deployment. Information on AUT types AUTs that are created with FXML seem to display long delays when showing screens. Object recognition and test execution are possible, but you will need to use longer waits when opening new screens in tests for these AUTs.

Supported components Below is an overview of the supported components. You can also see individual tickets for component support via the Eclipse bugzilla:
http://eclip.se/421595
